entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:22 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: WSW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
